title: Inheritance by Malinda Lo
description:

Reese and David are not normal teensÃ¢â‚¬â€not since they were adapted with alien DNA by the Imria, an extraterrestrial race that has been secretly visiting Earth for decades. Beyond the web of conspiracies, Reese canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t reconcile her love for David with her feelings for her ex-girlfriend Amber, an Imrian.
